column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Iroh says : " They say that the game of Pai Sho was invented by the spirits ... although some of them do n't seem to grasp it very well . "
#Text=Lotus spirit says : " Just hold on .
#Text=But time does not mean much to us here .
#Text=" Korra says : " How long have you lived here ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Oh , I 've been here for many years .
#Text=I had always enjoyed the company of the spirits , so when my work was done in the material world , I chose to leave my body behind and come to the Spirit World !
#Text=It can be a wonderful place , and I 've made so many friends .
#Text=Korra , what 's wrong ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I came here with my friend , but I lost her and now I 'm all alone .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You 're not alone Korra , it 's okay .
#Text=" Korra says : " No !
#Text=It 's not okay !
#Text=Jinora 's gone and I need to find her !
#Text=She 's lost , and we need to go home !
#Text=I do n't like the Spirit World , I do n't want to be here anymore !
#Text=" May says : " Did you say something to her ?
#Text=" Jim says : " Me ?
#Text=You 're the one with the big mouth !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Korra , please stop !
#Text=Look at what you 're doing to everyone !
#Text=" Korra says : " I did that ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " In the Spirit World , your emotions become your reality - especially for the Avatar , because you are the bridge between the two worlds .
#Text=You must try to stay positive .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry .
#Text=" Iroh says : " There , you see ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I can make the sun shine ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Even in the material world , you will find that if you look for the light , you can often find it .
#Text=But if you look for the dark , that is all you will ever see .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm looking for my friend .
#Text=I want her here now !
#Text=Why did n't she come out like the sun ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm afraid finding her wo n't be so easy .
#Text=" Korra says : " But what am I supposed to do ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Sometimes the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else .
#Text=This little fellow needs to go home as well .
#Text=Maybe if you help him find his friends , you will be able to find yours .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll take him home !
#Text=Where do I go ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " The dragon bird nest is located there , at the top of Hai - Riyo Peak .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Ugh , it 's not in here either !
#Text=I have to find the portals .
#Text=Korra is probably waiting for me there right now !
#Text=I need to find a map that shows where the spirit portals are , could you help me ?
#Text=Thanks , this is it !
#Text=The Tree of Time !
#Text=That 's where Avatar Wan imprisoned Vaatu !
#Text=The elders believe that as long as the portals are closed during the Harmonic Convergence , Vaatu will remain imprisoned and the battle between good and evil will not be fought again .
#Text=But , if both portals are open , spirit energy is amplified greatly .
#Text=During the Harmonic Convergence , this energy will be great enough to allow Vaatu to break free from his bonds , and the material world will again risk being consumed by darkness .
#Text=We have to warn Korra !
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Leaving so soon ?
#Text=When Wan Shi Tong told me he had a visitor , I had to see it with my own eyes .
#Text=I ca n't believe Tenzin sent his daughter here instead of coming himself - what kind of a father is he ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Better than you .
#Text=Wan Shi Tong , how can you be helping him ?
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Unalaq has proven to be a true friend to the spirits - unlike the Avatar .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Why would you wan na help Vaatu escape ?
#Text=He 'll destroy everything !
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Do n't believe everything you read .
#Text=Why do n't you come with me , so you can do some firsthand research ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Furry - Foot ... ?
#Text="
